derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from medieval Latin, from late Latin trachia, from Greek trakheia (artēria) 'rough (artery'), from trakhus 'rough'

means.word_mean: 1. membranous tube with cartilaginous rings that conveys inhaled air from the larynx to the bronchi
2. one of the tubules forming the respiratory system of most insects and many arachnids
